item.title: Projects
item.description: Hugo Website Code This is the github repository that host the hugo code that my wesite is built from chrisfrome.com This is the html code for the site that is generated by hugo BinConvert This is a Java number Converter. It lets you convert a decimal number to various other number formats CS 480 Portfolio Code This is the code used for my final class assignment for CS 480 at JMU.
